landing-pages-templates.question: Does the landing page is mobile responsive?
landing-pages-templates.answer: Yes. All the landing page designs are crafted with the use of bootstrap technology. Each element use in the landing page design is 100% mobile responsive.

landing-pages-templates.question: Are these landing page designs considering emotional marketing?
landing-pages-templates.answer: Yes. We are using emotional factors while designing the landing page. The ultimate goal of the landing page is to guide the user to the call to action button and make them fill the form. The page will benefit you to trigger the emotion of the user and make them become your loyal customer.

landing-pages-templates.question: Are these bootstrap landing pages are free to download?
landing-pages-templates.answer: There are a few bootstrap landing page download available for free of cost. You can download them as many times over without needing to pay. However, we do not offer customer support and documentation with the free template. You only receive technical support with the premium themes.

landing-pages-templates.question: Do I allow to modify the design of the template once purchase?
landing-pages-templates.answer:
Paid users have complete freedom to make any changes to the purchased bootstrap themes. You can add, remove, or customize the complete template without any limitation.

However, we would not be able to serve you if the technology you use in making the changes to the theme is not part of the contract. Therefore, it is advisable to consult with our support team before making any changes to keep your 1-year support service valid.

landing-pages-templates.question: How to contact the customer support team of the Lettstart Design?
landing-pages-templates.answer: You can visit our website www.lettstartdesign.com and fill the contact us form. Or drop us an email at support@lettstartdesign.com and info@lettstartdesign.com Our customer support team will get in touch with you as soon as we receive your message.

bootstrap-templates.question: Do I allow you to create unlimited websites or applications using these templates?
bootstrap-templates.answer: Yes. Users who have purchased the premium template receive the license to use the template on unlimited websites and applications without restriction.

bootstrap-templates.question: Can I use the premium and free bootstrap templates for commercial use?
bootstrap-templates.answer: Yes. You can use the free and premium types of bootstrap website templates for commercial use.

bootstrap-templates.question: Do I allow to resale the premium template in the market?
bootstrap-templates.answer: No. We have restricted the users from reselling the downloaded premium themes. Any users who are found guilty would be charged with the copyrights issue by Lettstart Design. Talk to the team of the Lettstart Design before you decide to resell any of the templates in the market and take the required permission.

bootstrap-templates.question: What kind of support can I expect from the LettStart Design after buying the premium bootstrap templates?
bootstrap-templates.answer: All the templates come with dedicated 1-year customer support for bug fixing, implementation guide, and error fixing. You can drop an email to us to determine whether the part of the changes you are willing to make on the purchased theme is eligible under the one-year contract. Our team is happy to address all your queries and solve template-related problems.

bootstrap-templates.question: Do I get all the files when I download the premium themes from the LettStart Design website?
bootstrap-templates.answer: Yes. All the essential files are combined in the zip folder for easy download. Once you have purchased the theme, you will be given the download link, which you can use to download the template resources. Upload the given files on your server, and your site will be live.

business-corporate-templates.question: Are the bootstrap corporate templates come with a content management system?
business-corporate-templates.answer: No. The bootstrap corporate templates are made to serve the front end of the website. For the backend, you have to install the content management system such as WordPress, Joomla, etc.

business-corporate-templates.question: Do I get the permanent license of the bootstrap corporate theme once download?
business-corporate-templates.answer: Yes. All the premium bootstrap corporate theme comes with permanent license. Once you have downloaded the premium themes, you can use them as per your need.

business-corporate-templates.question: Do I allow selling the bootstrap template for business website on other portals once I pay for it?
business-corporate-templates.answer: No. Users cannot sell the downloaded themes to the other portals without consultation with the Lettstart Design support team.

portfolio-resume-templates.question: Do I have the right to make the changes to the design after I purchase the bootstrap portfolio theme?
portfolio-resume-templates.answer: Yes. You have complete rights to make any required changes to the site once you have obtained the license from the Lettstart Design.

portfolio-resume-templates.question: What will be included in the download package?
portfolio-resume-templates.answer: You will receive the source code files combined in the zip folder. There will be separate pages, CSS files, documentation, and essential files that are needed to make your website live in the folder.

portfolio-resume-templates.question: Do the theme require a link back to the Lettstart Design website?
portfolio-resume-templates.answer: No. The premium theme doesn't require the link back to the Lettstart Design website. You can remove the link from the footer whenever you want.

portfolio-resume-templates.question: Can I change the theme color?
portfolio-resume-templates.answer: Yes. Changing the default theme color is possible on the Lettstart Design website. Add a preferred theme when you make your website live. However, you may require the help of the bootstrap developer to make the changes safely.

portfolio-resume-templates.question: Are these bootstrap resume websites are responsive?
portfolio-resume-templates.answer: Yes. All the bootstrap themes are 100% responsive. They are compatible with all types of modern devices. The theme automatically gets adjusted to the screen size. You will never have trouble accessing the website on desktop, mobile, and tablet.
